block.p: 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, 12-ft. ceilings, oversize windows, hardwood floors, needs renovation; maintenance $1,900, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $725,000, 16 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 950-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining foyer, windowed eat-in kitchen, central air-conditioning, common roof deck; maintenance $1,074, 53% tax-deductible; listed at $425,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

5-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,700-sq.-ft. postwar condo; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, marble baths, balcony, East River view, health club in building; common charge $1,365, taxes $13,900; listed at $1.2 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: David Day Real Estate)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,235-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, bay window in living room, granite countertops in kitchen, Central Park view, pool and health club in building; common charge $787, taxes $7,308; listed at $950,000, 23 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 765-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, floor-to-ceiling windows, marble baths, whirlpool bath, 2 exposures; common charge $779, taxes $5,052; listed at $435,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,170-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated prewar building; part-time doormen, dining area, beamed-ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 roof decks, washer and dryer in unit, gym in building; common charge $446, 100% tax-abated; listed at $410,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, turn-of-the-century brick town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, marble floors, finished basement with wine cellar, leaded glass windows, decorative columns, 3 fireplaces, 18.9-by-90-ft. lot; taxes $2,800; listed at $1.3 million (multiple bids), 13 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

2-family, semi-attached house built in 1901; 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, finished basement in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, eat-in kitchen in other, 27-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $1,572; listed at $400,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: John P. Burke)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, newly constructed colonial; 2-story entry, dining room, island kitchen, fireplace, 1-car garage, 55-by-90-ft. lot; taxes $600 (abated); listed at $449,900, 8 weeks on market (broker: Linda Nasta Realtor)

7-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 50-year-old colonial; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, family room, sitting room, home office, whirlpool bath, hardwood floors, 2-car garage, 0.33-acre lot; taxes $14,240; listed at $795,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Julia B. Fee; Coldwell Banker/Larchmont)

6-bedroom, 7 1/2-bath, 12-year-old Georgian colonial; 2-story entry, dining room, library, family room, kitchen with granite countertops, whirlpool bath, billiard room, exercise room, computer room, 4 fireplaces, 4-car garage, 4-acre lot; taxes $23,656; listed at $4.45 million, 25 weeks on market (brokers: Douglas Elliman Pickering; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
